system.description: You can increase your defense at the expense of your accuracy.
system.benefit: When you use the attack action or the full attack action in melee, you can take a penalty of as much as -5 on your attack roll and add the same number (+5 or less) as a dodge bonus to your Armor Class. This number may not exceed your base attack bonus. The changes to attack rolls and Armor Class last until your next turn.
system.special: A fighter may select Combat Expertise as one of his fighter bonus feats.
